org.hps.record.scalers

Class ScalersGenericObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hps.record.scalers.ScalersGenericObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GenericObject

    final class ScalersGenericObject
extends Object
implements GenericObject
    This is the LCIO GenericObject binding for EVIO scaler data. This should not be used directly. Rather the ScalerData class should be used for loading data from LCIO events.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int[] values
      The scaler data values.
